subject: Sexual power
body:
You need to buy lots of meds, but you don't want to pay huge sums of money? 
Click here to be the best lover in the world!
Absolutely legal, licensed and CHEAP pills at your choice. Confidential purchase. Instant shipping
Our shop
Lowest prices on the web, only licensed and quality pills.
With best regards,
Holly Moore
 
 
Kakoj cinizm! Daj mne tolko do Tebia dobratsia, shefir, i ia zastavliu tebia sozhrat sobstvennoe serdce, Prokliatyj ty podonok, tolko za to, chto ty sdelal s Nori, zastaviv ee igrat Etu paskudnuiu rol. Ne vopros, myslenno soglasilsia Kvin. I chuvstvoval, kak tverdeet, prevrashchaias v kamen, gortan, iazyk, N?bo. Edinstvennym bezborodym magom byl sam Namestnik, za chto ego narod neglasno velichal Gladkolicym, no malo smelchakov Reshalos proiznesti eto prozvishche vsluh pri svideteliah. 
Teper vmesto Neiu posredi komnaty stoiala kamennaia statuia. A kogda ia popytalsia Vyiasnit bolshe, chem emu hotelos, on menia prosto usypil. Ia pomrachnel. Da, osevoj. Ia znaiu kratchajshuiu dorogu cherez Etot makor do mertvoj zemli Ushcherbnyh gor. Teper on gotov. Zalp iz vtorogo Blasteratora snes shefiru levoe plecho vmeste s rukoj, otbrosil ego na spinku Kresla i vonzilsia v stenu za ego spinoj. Posmotrel By na sebia so storony, priamo zubami skrezheshchesh. 
Ulybnulas. Ia mgnovenno navostril ushi, pytaias poniat, o chem Dos tolkuet, no Kengsh, Neveroiatnoe delo, grubo oborval svoego bossa: Tem bolee, Dos. Chto navodilo na Mysl o tom, chto shefir ne schitaet menia bolshoj ugrozoj dlia sebia. Vmesto vozrozhdeniia etu tvar zhdet smert. ejisuminyon XFNaWHVCQlZRUUgcRkNURVdBWFpeHFBV
